name: $ilence
description: $ilence is a cult based on a message that, through unparalleled group success, we can collectively silence our critics and doubters and overcome adversity together. Our currency is the secondary focus and its value is a barometer for or success and conviction as a group. $ilence taps into an innate human emotion, feeling undervalued, unseen, or under appreciated. This is particularly relevant to traders in crypto and to the general population during a time of mass depression and decreasing sense of community and division.
